doc.abstracts: Ukraine has so far been unable to activate ita mass privatization program. However, in early March 1994, a multidonor mission to Ukraine signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) on mass privatization with the government. If this MOU and the 1994 State Privatization Program approved by Parliament in early 1994 are both implemented, the Ukraine mass privatization program could become one of the largest in the world. The author reviews the developments since Ukraine's independence, including the main provisions of the 1994 State Privatization Program and the MOU.
